BodyName: Committee on Fire and Emergency Management

Items.Title: Oversight - Fire Safety and Permitting Approval for Community Energy Storage Facilities.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Fire Safety and Permitting Approval for Community Energy Storage Facilities.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the governor to sign A.6955-A/S.7197, which would ensure that battery energy storage systems are sited at an appropriate distance from neighboring properties.
Items.MatterName: Ensure that battery energy storage systems are sited at an appropriate distance from neighboring properties. (A.6955-A/S.7197)
